note.p: Austrian lawyer and businessman. Studied in Prague and worked as a lawyer. From 1895, director of the credit bank, Vienna, and on the board of directors of the chemical factory Wagenmann, Seybel & Co. President of the Nordmährische Brewery and Malting Plant in Mährisch Schönberg (Šumperk), and the Lokomotivfabrik (engine factory), Vienna.
